class.name: UtilityAIAngleToVector2SearchCriterion
class.brief_description: Scores and filters based on the node minimum and maximum angle compared to the set [member angle_to_direction_vector].
class.description: The [Vector2] angle search criterion can be used to score and filter based on the node minimum and maximum angle compared to the set [member angle_to_direction_vector]. The search space direction is the (1,0) vector rotated by the global rotation amount.

members.member: The direction vector compare the search space node facing to.
Maximum angle in degrees. If the angle is more than this and filtering is applied, the tested node is filtered out.
Minimum angle in degrees. If the angle is less than this and filtering is applied, the tested node is filtered out.
